#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include<cmath>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int i,j,z,pow;
	char ch;
	ll n,num,ans;
	cin>>n>>ch>>z;
	while(n!=0)
	{
		if(n==1 && z==0)
			cout<<1<<endl;
		else
		{
			num=n;
			for(i=1;i<=z;i++)
				num=num*10;
			pow=1;
			while(pow<=num)
				pow=pow*2;
			pow=pow/2;
			ans=1+(num-pow)*2;
			cout<<ans<<endl;
		}
		cin>>n>>ch>>z;
	}
	return 0;
}
